Name: Lemongrad
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
STRAIN into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring tonic water.
Review: A great summer afternoon drink. Fresh lemon with elderflower and tonic.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2002 by Alex Kammerling in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Lemongrad contains 217 calories
